thread.title: Andy Evans
thread.title_full: Summer In Italy reviewed by Andy Evans

author: Andy Evans
title: Andy Evans
text: We started searching for accommodation on the Amalfi Coast for our summer holiday and came across the Summer in Italy website. We were immediately able to have direct communication with them via an online chat facility during which Anita was very helpful and offered a number of options to consider for the dates we had given. Although some of them were possibles we continued to search but this time, we amended our dates. As a consequence, we discovered an alternative apartment with Summer in Italy and from that point on, the booking process was quick, easy and trouble free. The initial contact that we had gave us real confidence to book through Summer in Italy and so far they haven't let us down. There is still some time before we travel but our experience so far with their customer service has been excellent.
